answers.answer: I had my first baby girl at 35 weeks due to high bp & preeclampsia . She was fine! She took a little longer to keep her body temp up and for her oxygen to level out but they just checked on her more. She came home with me in 2 days and she weighed 6lbs5oz at birth! Good luck!!
But I understand because I am having my third c section friday (the day I turn 37 weeks) with my first son & I am worried too!
Oh yes baby should be wonderful. You are CI sidered full tern weeks 37-40 if you went into natual labour at 37 weeks they wouldn't do anything to stop it :)
C section here at 34 weeks with twins b/c high BP. Both a little over 4 lbs.at birth and did great! Almost 5 years old now and the size of 6 year olds!
C section here at 34 weeks with twins b/c high BP. Both a little over 4 lbs.at birth and did great! Almost 5 years old now and the size of 6 year olds!
Sure should be fine, she might need a little extra monitoring but shouldn't need any serious medical attention. Good luck on the delivery!

question: Being induced monday because my blood pressure is so high...i will be 3 weeks early. Will my babygirl still be healthy??
